project.name: C-C190A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C190A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive INT_MAX=2147483647 Any input that is more than the square root of INT_MAX will cause an integer overflow. Good inputs are any number less than or equal to 46340. Bad inputs are greater than 46341. If an overflow occurs, it will result in an infinite loop

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="50" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C190A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: INT_MAX=2147483647 Any input that is more than the square root of INT_MAX will cause an integer overflow. Good inputs are any number less than or equal to 46340. Bad inputs are greater than 46341. If an overflow occurs, it will result in an infinite loop

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="46400" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(grep -E """^evaluating input$""" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) times\n"
SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^evaluating input$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_a3aA25PBKtzJ5F32qOYS AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_VaeSi2qLuW OR (NOT finished_Umw4qQuWnm AND NOT (controlled_exit_ZHQkofPjSI OR continued_execution_uN3NtW39eJ)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_VaeSi2qLuW OR (NOT finished_Umw4qQuWnm AND NOT (controlled_exit_ZHQkofPjSI OR continued_execution_uN3NtW39eJ))) OR controlled_exit_ZHQkofPjSI)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_VaeSi2qLuW OR (NOT finished_Umw4qQuWnm AND NOT (controlled_exit_ZHQkofPjSI OR continued_execution_uN3NtW39eJ)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_VaeSi2qLuW OR (NOT finished_Umw4qQuWnm AND NOT (controlled_exit_ZHQkofPjSI OR continued_execution_uN3NtW39eJ))) OR controlled_exit_ZHQkofPjSI))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
